title: Production Studio Technique
description: An in-depth exploration of what it means to produce a film project. Students will learn strategies to coordinate and plan a production, with emphasis on collaboration and coordination. From project design and budgets to time management and casting, this course introduces students to the creative capacity of producing. Prerequisites: open to cinematic arts majors and media majors. FILM 71 or VIS 60 and FILM 72 or VIS 70N.
